mapper.select: SELECT C.PRODUCT_NAME as product_name, B.ORDER_QUANTITY as ORDER_QUANTITY, A.ORDER_NO as ORDER_NO, A.ORDER_DATE as ORDER_DATE, A.TOTAL_PRICE as TOTAL_PRICE FROM O_ORDER A, O_ORDER_LIST B, PRODUCT C WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO AND B.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY A.ORDER_DATE DESC

SELECT C.PRODUCT_NAME as product_name, A.ORDER_ADDRESS as address, A.RECEIVER_NAME as reciever, A.ORDER_DATE as ORDER_DATE, B.ORDER_QUANTITY as ORDER_QUANTITY FROM O_ORDER A, O_ORDER_LIST B, PRODUCT C WHERE A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO AND B.PRODUCT_NO = C.PRODUCT_NO AND A.ORDER_NO = #{ order_no }
